name: Kevin Kiley

issues.title: School Choice and Education Reform
issues.description: Strong supporter of expanding school choice, advocating for charter schools and parental educational options

issues.title: COVID-19 Vaccine Mandates
issues.description: Opposed mandatory vaccination policies, particularly for schools and government employees

issues.title: Tax Reduction
issues.description: Advocates for reducing state taxes and limiting government spending

issues.title: Immigration Control
issues.description: Supports stricter border control and opposes sanctuary state policies

issues.title: Second Amendment Rights
issues.description: Strong defender of gun ownership rights, opposes additional gun control legislation
issues.source: NRA ratings and legislative voting record

issues.title: Regulatory Reform
issues.description: Seeks to reduce business regulations and streamline government bureaucracy

issues.title: Environmental Policy
issues.description: Skeptical of aggressive climate change policies, prioritizes economic considerations

donors.data_source: California Secretary of State Campaign Finance Database

sources: California Secretary of State Campaign Finance Records
